description.value: At 8th level, the cavalier gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{Improved Disarm} as a bonus feat. In addition, whenever he makes a successful disarm check, as long as he has at least one hand free and the dropped item can be held in one hand, he can automatically pick up the dropped item in his free hand.
